messages.message:
Brian
Hi, did you go to middle school in Arizona?
What's up buddy long time no see and yes i did. We hung out with john and sage and made a silly story if i remember correctly. lets see Desert Shadows middle school right?

Brian
Yeah, definitely!  I can't believe how long it's been.  John told me he has looked for you before but had no luck.  I thought the guy in your wife's picture looked like you.
I am working in Phoenix now, I went to Norther Arizona University and got a degree in computer science.  What have you been up to during all these years?

Not a whole lot its funny you found me on here cause i wasn't going to make one but wife wanted me too so it showed who she was married to on hers lol. I'm actually still in school to become a journeyman electrician. 4 yrs in now. Living in Las Vegas where i moved after i left phoenix. That is really great that you went through with the computer thing. I actually thought that is what you be doing just from what i remember from us hanging out at your house as kids. Nice to hear you and john still in contact. You 3 are the only ones i remember from phoenix and the last time that i  visited i got to see john but even that was a long time ago. You guys still talking to sage and have you found yourself a good girl yet?

Brian
I think John has a girlfriend.  I am quite single, unfortunately.  Apparently Sage goes by a different name now, I think John has talked to him.

Nice nice. Well if your ever in vegas some time or you ever plan on coming up here for a trip or something let me know and we can meet up for dinner or something and you can meet my wife and such. Glad to hear your doing well. I dont use facebook very much but i'll do my best to get back to you if you do send me message or something. If you talk to john you can tell him he can throw me a friend request to if he wants.

Hey bro you in Vegas? Saw a pic on the wall thing. Well if you are we should meet up for dinner or something with me and my wife. I haven't seen you guys in so long(John,sage, and yourself). Would be cool to catch up?

Brian
I was recently, but we've already returned.  I will let you know next time we are planning a trip.
